website_summaries.verdict: A highly reliable multi-tool that provides plenty of power for jobs around the house. It might have trouble with tougher jobs, such as cutting through metal pipes or hardwood, but most DIYers were more than satisfied with this tool.
pros: Corded tool provides consistent power, whether cutting floorboards to fit door frames or removing grout around old tiles
No wrench needed to change blades thanks to a quick-lock lever
DIYers were overwhelmingly happy with its reliability, particularly on smaller jobs
cons: Blade switching was difficult for some users despite quick-lock feature
Reports of tool head misaligning after only a few uses, damaging blades
Reports of ceasing to work after a few uses, and a few users felt it didn’t have enough power

customer_reviews.title: great new model.
customer_reviews.text: I had the older model I bought about 5 years ago.used it hard to do the grout removal in a small bathroom and then a few odd jobs. When I used to to do more grout work it lasted about an hour and just quit.so I bought this one. Big improvement. Thanks dremel
customer_reviews.author: Happycamper 79

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this dremel mm40
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but once your spent on blades best of luck trying to find blades that fit this without bending over for dremel..I would like to return it just because of that..they made this so selective that its not worth it at any price...every affordable blade set I've looked at specifically says "will not fit mm-40"...
customer_reviews.author: mr28

customer_reviews.title: Trusted manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Good for intended purpose but, work results are slow due to the nature of this type of product. However it can do things otherwise difficult or impossible. Origional manufacturer accessory blade cost appear unusually expensive compared to aftermarket alternatives. Proprieitary fitment of blade to tool requires adapter for aftermarket. This adapter sells for between 29 cents and 6 dollars plus, same quality, depending on retailer.
customer_reviews.author: P Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly capable tool
customer_reviews.text: I live in a home with plaster and lathe walls, and it's tricky to make clean cuts in them without really screwing things up. This tool has been very useful. If you're doing electrical work in your home I'd recommend a tool like this. Subtracting one star for the case, which doesn't seem to fit the tool with a saw mounted to it, and the cord has to be positioned just right... you know the feeling. Would prefer a nice soft case personally. Unlike dremel rotary tools this thing is quite beefy and seems fairly powerful. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool
customer_reviews.text: I was doing a DIY floor installation and this tool came in handy. I was able to cleanly cut the door frames and casing to lay the floor under it. I also used this in several odd jobs like removing some of the old laminate underneath the wall and cutting the new wood laminate in difficult place like at the bottom of the stairs. The tool is small enough that you can really get into tight spaces and have good control over it. I also liked that I did not have to worry about losing a finger like when I am working a saw. Overall, I highly recommend this tool to any DIYer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the tool head went out of alignment. I sent it in for repair and when I got it back the next one did the same thing. either they did not put new parts in the one I sent back or they are all junk. There is also another review of the same thing happening Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Belott

customer_reviews.title: Yup, A SCRAPER!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has so many attachments, it’s unbelievable! I was amazed how handy the scrapper was to remove flooring tiles. So I had to write a review on how good this tool is. It does lack safety features, so, be careful using it. Make sure it’s unplugged when changing attachments! It can come on if you accidentally flip the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy R.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this tool
customer_reviews.text: Is it weird to have a crush on a power tool?! I LOVE this tool. Working on a remodel and have used this more than any other tool. Drywall, removing linoleum, cutting metal nails. My only complain is that replacement blades are hard to find at local hardware stores. So if something gets worn out (i.e. scraper blade on 800 sq. ft. of linoleum) then you have to wait a couple days for new pieces.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Greater independence and love it
customer_reviews.text: First bought the smaller version, mostly for craft projects and loved it BUT found I needed something stronger and sturdier for house hold project. This is a reliable easy to use tool with endless uses. So happy, don't have to wait for my husband it grown sons to get things done. I am now much mor independent and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: cozy one

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the original at nearly half the cost!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who also owns the original (Fein) tool, I have to admit this unit at half the price is 95% as good. It'll do 90% of what you want for 90% of the people. These Oscillating tools are something you'll never know you needed until you have one, then you'll find out just how fantastic they are. Tons of attachments (yes, different brands other than Dremel attachments will work).
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Possibly good for some things just not cutting wood or metal
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cut a 5/16 piece of cocobolo with two of the different wood blades with poor results. I tried to use one of the metal blades for a 1/8 brass rod which it struggled to get through. This thing is massive and heavy, definitely a two handed deal. In the end I got out my Black and Decker "Dremel" tool out and used the cutting disk to cut the remaining rod segments which worked so much better. Then I used a multi directional cutting bit to finish cutting the wood. The lines would have been better if this Dremal saw would have worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and the blade flipped 90 degrees to the right
customer_reviews.text: I own a number of Dremel tools and have never had a problem with them in the past. I purchased the Dremel multi-tool expecting the same type of quality but have been sadly disappointed. While using it on my first project the blade head rotated 90 degrees to the right and I can find no way to re-orient it back to it's straight-out position. The tool is virtually useless in it's current configuration. Can't figure out how they didn't pick this up in there quality control Anyway looking to get service under the 2 year warranty. I'll let you know how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a DIY bathroom remodel and I love it! It is really easy and fun to use. The case has plenty of room for the tool as well as blade storage. Blade changes are simple and easy. My only complaint is blade choice. Dremel doesn't offer some of the same blade choices as other brands and not all blades are compatible with the Dremel Multi-Max. Although it was a bit frustrating, eventually I was able to the blades I needed to get the job done. Oh, I wouldn't bother using Harbor Freight blades with this. The few I attempted (said they were compatible) to use vibrated right out of the locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every DIYer needs an Oscillating Tool
customer_reviews.text: The tool is rugged. All attachment blades fit and work well. The one thing that is not a "quick snap" is the magnetic pick up and slot alignment of the attachment tools. I am picky. I expect the attachment tool to fly in properly for lock down. This is my first and only Oscillating Tool so I can not compare it to the performance of others on the market
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool a couple of years ago for what I thought was an exorbitant price. It kind of sat in my tool locker for a couple of years. I prefer portable cordless tools when possible. I recently installed a large bathroom mirror and my cordless Dremel was making a mess with its drywall bit spitting dust everywhere so I broke out the Multi-max. Holy crap. Not only did it slice through the drywall in about a quarter of the time but the lines were perfect. How could I have left it on the bench for so long? One of the best purchases I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Martinex

customer_reviews.title: This tool is becoming indispensable for wood repair work.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one of these a long time ago. Great tool that just solves so many repair problems. I use it all the time now for wood repair, corner work, cutting holes or cutting through nails and screws in close quarters. It saves so much time and effort, and makes the finished job look so much better than if I had hacked away with other inappropriate tools like I have always done in the past.
customer_reviews.author: earlwise

customer_reviews.title: Dremel MM40-05 Multi-Max 3.8-Amp Oscillating Tool Kit with Quick-Lock Review
customer_reviews.text: This product really works great for its purpose. The blades are okay too but I'm hoping for a bit sharper so it can saw a bit faster. I'm not sure if the blades' lifespan is fine as I haven't used it for a long time. I'll update this review when I find out.
customer_reviews.author: Hotshot 13

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set twice now and have been sent a lower quality set with less blades, sand paper and a soft case. It made it not worth the cost for me. I also tried using it to cut around the bottom of a dresser. It overheated quickly, as others described. It also had a much more difficult time with the hard wood. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: this thing is super useful for all kinds of little jobs!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for cutting stuff in hard to reach places! I'm using this to build an office in a finished basement and it comes in super handy for cutting existing trim, the carpet tack boards, anything that needs a quick cut. It does work on 2 by 4s, but it struggles a little bit.. just have to be patient. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I recommend getting it with the bundled accessories, saves you quite a bit of money and you are ready to go out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: wildusa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool and attachments
customer_reviews.text: Used to cut off the track system under a table with leaves (had been screwed and glued) so I could cut the table to make smaller and reattach the track for leaves. Could not have done project without the tool. Have used it several more times for other random projects. Have other dremel but this has been the most useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle2here

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 tool in my box
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one died after about 3 years of normal/ moderate use. I believe the motor is some what susceptible to dust issues and caused it to die. Needed a new one and I would order a new one every year if need be. What it can do is simply awesome. It cuts like a dream. Like all tools, you really need ear protectors, especially inside. I only use it to cut, I find a 7 inch sander to do a better job in sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gutekunst

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Bought it for flooring installation. Within 10-15 minutes, scraper blade broken to 2 pieces. None of them cut thru carpets. Handle is too bulky, had to hold it with 2 hands and got blister.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Girl

customer_reviews.title: You must have one of these if you do things yourself.
customer_reviews.text: How did I do stuff before I acquired this tool? It has so many uses beyond cutting wallboard. I needed to remove some framing and this tool allowed me to cut the nails easily. The list goes on and on. This tool has paid for itself many times over. Jobs go much easier and I don’t need to hire someone else to do them.
customer_reviews.author: No_Pen_Name

customer_reviews.title: Get one if you're a DIY type person
customer_reviews.text: A box blade works great on sheet rock, this works better. especially when you're cutting a 6" hole in the ceiling for a recessed light and find out there is a sheet a plywood underneath (on top I guess for ceiling lol). Box blade or even a sheet rock blade for the rotary tool not getting that. this was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SirQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect power tool for small jobs!
customer_reviews.text: My cordless dremel wasn’t allowing me enough work time. I went to the hardware store and it’s hard to tell which to buy. Couldn’t beat the price on Amazon, the stock on Amazon, or the reviews helping you know which to get for what you have to work on. This has been a great little tool for grout removal and shower repairs.
customer_reviews.author: N D

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from "Justin Smiles" and "fulfilled by Amazon." Tool is OK, but product page pictured and described a nice-looking hard carry case. I received a cloth sack, whose longevity appears dubious for storing cutting tools. Would purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KCZ41

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 hrs use
customer_reviews.text: Died after about 3 hrs use. Power Switch no longer “snaps” into place and it won’t turn on. Unfortunately it’s out of warranty now. UPDATE: I called Dremel support. They replaced it with a new unit. Hopefully this one will last. Very handy tool for all kinds of jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile tool so far...
customer_reviews.text: The tool performs very well and the only reason I did not give it 5 stars was that I had to return it after only 2 weeks. The quick-lock function would not open up, thus not allowing me to remove the blade. Amazon quickly replaced the unit, no questions asked and the new unit has worked perfectly so far. Overall, the tool is very useful and powerful and has helped with many projects including drywall and other. Would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Geat product
customer_reviews.text: this is my first time to own this type of product and its been a great purchase. this tool has saved me lots and lots of money and time. If you are on the fence of weather to buy it or not I highly recommend it if your a beginner or a well seasoned handy man. this tool has lots and lots of power you will not be disapointed
customer_reviews.author: cesar

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit to help peel up old sticky backed vinyl flooring. I was using a large industrial sized scraper but that was slow going it was killing my wrist and hand. Using the flexible attachment made the job child’s play. Very easy tooless blade changes. I’ve used it for under cutting door casings too. Should have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pete G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT starter kit
customer_reviews.text: As advertised Arrived quickly. GREAT starter kit. Included accessories allow many different applications. Allows me to do jobs that otherwise would be very difficult! As needs and use expands, more and different accessories are available. Affordable
customer_reviews.author: SeedyUU

customer_reviews.title: I’d pay double for this item!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is exceptional in both performance and durability. Easy to change blades, cuts wood, cement board, plastics like butter. Perfects those cuts that a round blade or jig saw can’t handle.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool, but must use Dremel blades that are expensive
customer_reviews.text: The mm40 is incompatible with all the cheap replacement blades. The tool itself is fine, but it goes through blades really quickly and buying Dremel brand blades is expensive. I would buy some other brand that has a broader base for replacement blades.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G

customer_reviews.title: EZ Blade Change
customer_reviews.text: A much improved tool when compared to it's Granddaddy; the first of the Dremel Oscillating Tools. The addition of a "quick" blade install/removal is a winner. This one is a bit heavier, however.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: A real disappointing tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful product, for about a month... I guess if you like buying tools that last a whole 30 days then croaks buy this item. If not, and you’d prefer a tool that has some longevity to it, I’d advise you not buy this Dremel
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Tool is a godsend
customer_reviews.text: Dremel has improved this tool over the years and now it has a quick-connect for all the bits; no more allen keys. Thank you Dremel. The case is compact and this set has all the bits you need.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Remove old grout
customer_reviews.text: Used this tool to remove grout from large ceramic kitchen tile. Easy to use, just let the tool work. Changing tools is really easy with the Dremel system. Easy to clean the dust with a vacuum cleaner, doesn't fly all over the place. Very impressive product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Yanker

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Imagine Owning a Home Without
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile and valuable. Also have a Dremel rotary tool, but use this way more. Can make precise cuts in odd areas. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Attention to Detail

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because im a diy fun and i need a tool that is versatile and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's my first multitool. I bought it because im a diy fun and i need a tool that is versatile and compact for home and hobby (wood working) jobs. After watching reviews on net and putting specs to price i chose the mm40 dremel. I am using it a lot from wood working to fixing jobs at my house and other projects that i have. It is well built and very comfortable. The only disadvantaged of the tool is it short electrical cable.
customer_reviews.author: sany haim

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommended this tool
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this tool a month and I have already used it on baseboards, grout, and drywall. It saved me a lot of time, especially when removing grout. There are lots of attachments (Dremel and other brands) that will fit this that makes this very versatile. I highly recommended this tool.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: I love tools
customer_reviews.text: Used this to remove and extremely old bathroom fan that was installed with metal railings underneath floor joist.... cut the metal easily and have a new working bathroom fan with bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: HandyMomMarisolTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, versatile, and handy. But, if ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, versatile, and handy. But, if you use it for more than 10 mins, your hand will start to tingle from its vibration. Just be careful not to use it for extensive amount of time, you might damage your nerve on your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool to remove old caulking. It worked like a charm. I also used it remove grout. It's so easy to use and I see a lot of other uses for home handywoman jobs.
customer_reviews.author: catrish

customer_reviews.title: Great tool easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this tool a lot while he was installing new flooring in our house and it has been amazing. It works really well and it is easy to use. I have issues it for smaller projects around the house and I love it too. We would.definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tool! I’ve used (and burnt up) several Harbor Freight ones. Much less vibration, less heat, more power, better built
customer_reviews.author: Terry Welty

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come with hard case like pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this TWICE! First time I read descriptions said it came with a HARD case, came in soft case and appeared used. Returned. Recorded per picture and description saying it came with a HARD case, again showed up in soft case.. sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Hidi Culp

customer_reviews.title: A Tool for many Purposes, especially hard to get places
customer_reviews.text: Used this for cutting door jamb molding. Spend a little more and get this tool. Dremel stands up to its name and construction. Lots of power, variable speed, lots of blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P

customer_reviews.title: Needed for trimming some wall trim.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to undercut some baseboard to run and hide some wires. This worked fantastic. Would recommend getting an assortment of cutting bits. The one it comes with are good but arent great for every single project
customer_reviews.author: mstrymxer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for multiple home improvement projects
customer_reviews.text: The tool was very helping in a backsplash project. Cutting out old backsplash and drywall down to the studs. The only part I would have liked to have seen improve was the longevity of the blades. I went through two separate “wood and drywall” blades in the time I was cutting. Even so, I thought the tool was very helpful and durable. Not too heavy or noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Order for the Hard Case in the web page for the tool.
customer_reviews.text: Order for the Hard Case in the web page for the tool. Received a tote style bag. I travel and a hard case would have been nice and I know, I have traveled over 42 major cities to work for my company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke one chuck
customer_reviews.text: It was past the Amazon return window. Returned it to Dremmel and they sent a new one!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Great tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I bought this to remove grout from a ceramic tile floor and it worked out beautifully. I have a drywal project coming up soon so I think I will use my new favorite gadget :p
customer_reviews.author: Smp

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Did a little trial and worked like it should. Getting ready to do my project of removing old dry wall. Update: totally happy with this item. Used it on several projects and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I this is without a doubt a great tool. First one I've ever had like this and it worked like a champ. Take the door jambs rod off made the floor install look better than professional. Blades unfortunately are a little bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Hamm36

customer_reviews.title: Worked even better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: We had to cut some bar metal for installation of a barn-type door. Wanted something for a clean efficient cut. It worked great to do this. I was not sure about the cutting tool attachment but it worked great and was very easy to connect and disconnect. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: The low rating is because I didn't receive this model as listed, so I returned what I received.
customer_reviews.text: I received a different model that what is pictured so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AHD

customer_reviews.title: For a variety of jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times but very pleased. When you own and use a lot of tools, you know a good one when you get it. This tool is one you will be happy with and use often.
customer_reviews.author: ThommoorFit

customer_reviews.title: Time-saving product
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended that I purchase this tool and I'm happy I did. Makes quick work out of the stripping I have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to rip drywall, clear grout lines, undercut door jambs, chop metal screws...I could go on and on. Great product, versatile and SAFE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the case in the photo
customer_reviews.text: It came with a tool bag, not the case shown. I needed this for a project so I didn't return it. Other than that this is a great tool to keep in your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: wade Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through difficult material.
customer_reviews.text: It has enough power to cut through metal. Basic attachments included.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Novak

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy but its perfect for me to use (female). I get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: texasgirl53

customer_reviews.title: I actually like that this one is corded vs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dremel multi max tool. I actually like that this one is corded vs. battery. My first one died and it was a bit of a pain to make sure the battery was charged before use or have the battery die during use.
customer_reviews.author: kernswv

customer_reviews.title: Dremel MM40-05 Multi-Max
customer_reviews.text: My husband REALLY likes the new Dremel Oscillating Tool Kit! He's used it for several household updates. He has NO complaints at all with it! And HE'S picky!! We'd give it 6 stars if we could!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nan

customer_reviews.title: Product Phots is Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Nice saw but product photo clearly shows a plastic storage box. Description also states a storage box is included. What you get is a cloth bag that might last a couple of weeks, and offers no protection to saw for storage.
customer_reviews.author: George Back

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for dad!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and it works perfectly! You can use it for almost everything!
customer_reviews.author: Bb’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: This tool saved me from working many hours. I got the job done in minutes! Amazing product for the price. Top quality
customer_reviews.author: Erick Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Won't even start
customer_reviews.text: My husband just opened his Christmas gift, ready to go, and it won't start. He's done all the troubleshooting, and nothing works. There doesn't seem to be a place where he can exchange or return it - any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Hollinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: A BIG step up from the one lost in the flood.. Much stronger motor and easier to use. Only used it for a small project but I can see and feel the difference. Look forward to using this for other projects around the house and to work on the rental property maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxontheweb

customer_reviews.title: This is a great litter powerful saw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great litter powerful saw. I'm so glad to have something I can handle easily, but does a great job on many kinds of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Creekside Rummager

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I was borrowing an older model of this - MM20 2.5amp. This one is so much better! More power, quieter, and so much easier to change attachments. Very happy with this purchase. This is something every DIY homeowner should have!
customer_reviews.author: Km737

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one just because I wanted the easy lock. It seems to be about as good as the other one I have except the vibrating seems to be reduced a bit, which is nice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shila Chaney

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like I wasted my money buying this
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have, I don't feel like I wasted my money buying this!
customer_reviews.author: William Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many tool purchases that get used briefly after purchase, I have put this to heavy use in my bathroom remodel project. I've used it to remove construction adhesive, notch studs for a shower pan liner recess, other framing tweaks, cut nails, undercut door frame molding, and to cut circles and small notches out of cement backerboard. It has been working great for the month plus of almost daily use. I am extremely happy with it so far. I wish I'd had it when I did my kitchen remodel. It has been my go-to tool on this project. If it keeps working as it has, this will be my favorite purchase of the year.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN N GOODCHILD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and has all the essential accessories needed for average handyman tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Zapita

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. It saves so much time remodeling
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It saves so much time remodeling. I can get into tight corners and spaces easily.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: No alan wrench needed..
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool with variable speeds. I love that you dont need a wrench to change blades.
customer_reviews.author: rondp

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this tool work wonderful if you need something small that can do a big job this is the tool.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Good multi oscillating tool
customer_reviews.text: Good to take off old grout from tile, sanding, etc. There is no need to charge or change battery every 30 minutes of use or so.
customer_reviews.author: Anon913

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful tool - I am so happy with this purchase. The grout remover bladel zipped through the grout and the scraper easily removed the mastic under the tiles. And the blade changing mechanism works great.
customer_reviews.author: Licksdad

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Dremel, I worked the first one to death. Great tool for an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: sully

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this years ago !! Makes work SO much simpler
customer_reviews.author: jeff b.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: A great all purpose tool. I bought it for the scrapper and it works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mclennan

customer_reviews.title: Has been my favorite tool. It just started oscillating intermittently
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since I bought it May 2016 on a remodel. Has been my favorite tool. It just started oscillating intermittently, so I need to see if it can be fixed. Unfortunately I need it now, so I had to buy another tool to use now.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: But looks like it will do some good projects
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it yet. But looks like it will do some good projects. Dremel is always good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Em

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, love the easy blade installation lever. Plenty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: richard miller

customer_reviews.title: Attachments are expensive purchased separately.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool... very useful in different projects...cuts clean on multiple materials...sanding, cutting, scraping does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome tool!! Have used to refinish window sills and cutouts to install new windows. Even loaned to professional window installer to use. Excellent tool, great price, fast shipping. Very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works great did the job I needed for trimming doorways for flooring
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with tool
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with tool. Great power to weight ratio. Have already used it to cut wood, metal, and cement board and its performed very well and in some really tight places. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool kit at a good price with lots of accessories. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Goes thru nails like nothing
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life? This thing is amazing! Replaced some wood siding and it was so easy to get behind the boards and go thru nails like nothing
customer_reviews.author: Andre Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for fathers day and He Loves It!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love this Dremel tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this Dremel tool. I don't use it all the time but it's a specialty tool. Comes in handy for jobs where other tools may not work.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: This Dremel with the rigid scraper is doing a great job. But with 500+ square feet to scrap
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Dremel to remove bottom pain on my boat. The bottom paint has never been scraped since 1985 and has considerable build up... This Dremel with the rigid scraper is doing a great job. But with 500+ square feet to scrap, it is a process!... But better than chemical and hand scrapers.
customer_reviews.author: W08flyer

customer_reviews.title: Indepensible Tool for Tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Easy transaction and already in use and worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: lehua13

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. Works very well. Comes with different blades, sanders, and case. All of high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So easy to use and well worth the money. My new favorite tool.
customer_reviews.author: TPM

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, ordered it for a remodeling project and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tool, ordered it for a remodeling project and it easily cut through the drywall and plywood. Saved me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Working as intended
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for my girlfriend to do work around the house, she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Asycient

product_meta.title: Dremel MM40-05 Multi-Max 3.8-Amp Oscillating Tool Kit with Quick-Lock Accessory Change Interface and 36 Accessories
product_meta.description: The Dremel Multi-Max mm40 oscillating tool is equipped with a powerful 3.8 amp motor, also coupled with 3.2 degrees of oscillation, which makes it the highest amp rated tool at the 129 price point. In addition to the amps, the new kit offers 36 accessories offering customers a 115 value, as well as the Quick change feature and you have one of the best oscillating tool kits in the market place!.
feature_bullets: High-performance 3.8 Amp motor for the most demanding applications
Quick-Lock for tool-less and secure accessory changes
Quick-Boost - maintains constant speed throughout toughest applications and materials
Quick-hold - magnetic flange holds the accessory in place for easier accessory changes
Up-front on/off switch – for one-handed use and maintains speed setting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars385 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
